data.back: Use the controls below to mark a question correct, incorrect or flip to find the answer.
Through Google Drive! At the end of this tutorial or on the homepage you can sign-in through Google and search your documents.

data.front: How should my Doc be formatted?

data.back: We use a version of the spaced-repetition so you'll see more of the cards you're having difficulty.
All of your progress is saved to your Google Drive. You can start-up at anytime from your phone, tablet or laptop.
